name: Verify Cerebellum Minigame - Timing Challenge
description: Validates that the Cerebellum.kp4 minigame functions correctly with slider timing mechanics.
testObjective: Ensure timing-based minigame mechanics work correctly and can be completed successfully.
author: Dominic Brooks

steps.action: Locate and run the Cerebellum.kp4 file from Filesystem
steps.expected: Minigame initiates and displays circular track with slider

steps.action: Observe the slider moving around the circular track
steps.expected: Slider moves continuously around the circle

steps.action: Identify the small red sections on the track
steps.expected: Red target zones are visible on the circular track

steps.action: Click [LMB] when slider is NOT in a red section
steps.expected: Click registers as miss or incorrect timing

steps.action: Click [LMB] when slider reaches a red section
Check Filesystem for new files after completion
steps.expected: New file 'report.kp4' has been added to Filesystem
